thought.text: Let me try to work around this by directly importing the specific modules I need:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpqkw8olt_/astropy && python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import astropy.io.ascii.rst as rst_module; print('RST module imported successfully')"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmpqkw8olt_/astropy && python -c \"import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); import astropy.io.ascii.rst as rst_module; print('RST module imported successfully')\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
